Text: None of the states that have banned or are likely to ban abortion also guarantee #PaidLeave. They are taking away your right to decide if & when you'll have children & doing nothing to protect your job, paycheck, or health insurance while you're pregnant or caring for a newborn. https://t.co/XM9OcA5udK

.@KathyHochul has been my steadfast partner in the fight to protect our fundamental rights. I'm proud to call her our governor, and I'm ready to elect her for a full term. New York, make a plan to get out and vote tomorrow! https://t.co/rgiCy16rDX
You deserve the basic, fundamental right to bodily autonomy. It is unconscionable for our government to force you to carry a pregnancy that could put your life and health at risk.

Today @JoeBiden signed the most significant gun safety legislation in thirty years into law, including provisions from my bill to make gun trafficking a federal crime. To the students, the parents, and all the activists who worked so hard to make this victory possible: Thank you.

Yesterday the Supreme Court didn't believe in states' rights when they want to set commonsense gun safety laws. Today they believe in states' rights when they want to attack our reproductive freedom. This court no longer represents logic, equal justice, or the will of the people.

When you take away someone's ability to make their own decisions about their own body, they are no longer a citizen. They no longer have freedom, bodily autonomy, or basic civil rights. That's the America that the Supreme Court's decision overturning #RoeVWade just created. https://t.co/ojjfvfaQp0

The Supreme Court decision this morning was a major blow. But we just passed the most significant gun safety bill in nearly 30 years — including provisions from my bill to make gun trafficking a federal crime.

Your voices and your votes matter. Never stop fighting.

I met with the families of those wounded and killed in Buffalo. I've seen their pain and their grief. And I would do anything it takes to spare other families from that pain and stop this gun violence epidemic.

We've already seen what happened in other states that made it easier for anyone to carry concealed weapons in public. Now the Supreme Court's decision has put millions of Americans in New York and across the country at even greater risk of gun violence. https://t.co/uRQwhZ9Gwu

This argument is callous and absurd. The mass shooting in Buffalo shows why we need to do MORE to keep guns out of the hands of dangerous people instead of taking away one of the basic, commonsense protections New York already had. https://t.co/rUPsSGZUWz

The last thing we should be doing in a gun violence epidemic is making it easier for potentially dangerous people to carry weapons in public. Lives are at risk because of this irresponsible decision. https://t.co/GQSg64Tkpz
We have a deal to pass the most important anti-gun violence legislation in nearly 30 years. Now we need your help to get it across the finish line. https://t.co/XXNilmCrIY

Had a wonderful evening hosting my fellow women senators at President Lincoln's Cottage for our traditional bipartisan dinner! I'm so lucky to have this sisterhood. ❤️ Thank you @MariaCantwell and @DebforNebraska for co-hosting. https://t.co/FD05bqAMw5

If your child is six months or older, they can now get the COVID-19 vaccine! It's safe, free, and it's the best way to keep your little ones safe from getting seriously ill. Talk to your pediatrician or find a vaccine site in your neighborhood here: https://t.co/LA237A4hwr

Happy #Juneteenth! Today we celebrate emancipation & the abolition of slavery in the United States. But we have so much more work to do to truly realize the promise of freedom for every Black American. We need to keep working to root out systemic racism & ensure justice for all.
Theo, Henry and I are so lucky to have you. Happy Father's Day, Jonnie! https://t.co/afY2ngzWoI

The vast majority of guns used in a crime in New York are trafficked from out of state. That's why I've fought so hard to make gun trafficking a federal crime. Cracking down on the flood of illegal guns is one of the best ways we can fight gun violence. https://t.co/bq0yPjHklT

This is big: Today the Senate passed the PACT Act, which guarantees that veterans exposed to toxic burn pits will finally get the health care they deserve. They answered the call to serve — now we're fulfilling our obligation to get them the care they are owed. https://t.co/J1BqmmgOtn

After we passed the World Trade Center Health Program, @johnfeal2, @jonstewart and I began a new fight: Ensuring veterans exposed to toxic burn pits got the health care they deserve. We fought beside veterans and their families, and today, the Senate finally passed the #PACTAct. https://t.co/fVg822rRMz
RT @jaketapper: And of course the legislators such as @SenGillibrand and @marcorubio

I've been fighting for over 10 years to make gun trafficking a federal crime, and I'm proud that the bipartisan gun deal will do so. Stopping the flood of illegal weapons is one of the most significant things we can do to drive down gun violence.  https://t.co/3rmMiDUYaV
RT @TheBuffaloNews: Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand's crackdown on gun trafficking included in compromise https://t.co/EdIYNDU1ba

We'll have two primary elections in New York this summer, and the first is on June 28th! I just filled out my absentee ballot. Make your plan, make sure your voice is heard, and get out and vote! https://t.co/cpXkPlnSAd https://t.co/kUS2hdA1nA
Workers won. Now it's time for Amazon to recognize @amazonlabor's historic victory and start negotiating with them in good faith. https://t.co/ajqsgyvKl7

This is a major step forward. I've fought for years to make gun trafficking a federal crime, and I'm extremely pleased that this deal would do so. I can't wait to work with this bipartisan group to pass this legislation and send it to the President's desk. https://t.co/AOFpWc5dqW

Our failure to guarantee universal #PaidLeave is hurting families and holding our entire country back. I talked with Dr. Mona Amin about how not having #PaidLeave impacts the families that she sees. https://t.co/QSGmrqI5Uz

Millions of Americans are investing in cryptocurrencies, but our regulations aren't keeping up. The bill @CynthiaMLummis and I introduced would create a robust regulatory framework to protect consumers and shut these scams down. https://t.co/hoQ4Qwbj21

I'll be live soon at #Consensus2022 with @CynthiaMLummis and @CoinDesk to talk about our landmark new bill to establish a regulatory framework for cryptocurrency and digital assets, join us! https://t.co/i2g3aYiy4G
Happy birthday, @GabbyGiffords! I'm so lucky to call you my friend. ❤️ https://t.co/wX1FctmtdH
RT @washingtonpost: Join @PostLive for conversations with @CFTCbehnam, @SenGillibrand, @SenLummis, @ddisparte and @TomicahTD about what ove…

It's time to lay down the rules of the road. Today I introduced a major new bill with @CynthiaMLummis to create a robust framework for regulating cryptocurrency and digital assets, protecting consumers and providing clarity for the industry and regulators. https://t.co/oiOarIq3O2

If you served our country, we have the obligation to support you, protect you, and ensure that you get the health care you have earned and DESERVE. We must pass the #PACTAct to ensure veterans exposed to toxic burn pits during their service get the care they need. https://t.co/hRhlRC3byU
Thanks to everyone who came to our #PrideMonth kick-off, and thanks @MartiGCummings for being our fabulous host! https://t.co/zfvu9lQopk
RT @MartiGCummings: Years ago I was so honored to be the 1st drag artist to moderate a Q&A w a Presidential Candidate when @SenGillibrand r…
Military-style assault rifles are designed to kill dozens of people in just seconds. Members of our armed forces train for years just to handle them. Civilians shouldn't be able to purchase one.
RT @iava: 1/3 "Sen. Gillibrand has been a partner with #IAVA for years on so many important issues related to our veterans and 9/11 First R…

Every June we #WearOrange to remember the victims of gun violence, but this year hits especially hard after the devastation in Buffalo and Uvalde. We shouldn’t be afraid to send our kids to school or go to the grocery store. I won't stop fighting until we pass real gun reform.
RT @johnfeal2: Friends - What an honor to stand with the @iava @Burnpit360 & all the other VS0's one more time in NYC with @SenGillibrand t…
Happy #PrideMonth! You deserve to live openly, proudly, and safely as your most true and authentic self — and I won't stop fighting until that's possible for every single LGBTQ+ American.
It's going to be a fantastic night — join us! https://t.co/wtqxUc1WeJ

This #MemorialDay, we honor and remember our service members who made the ultimate sacrifice in service to our country. We will never forget their bravery and their sacrifice, and we will always hold their loved ones in our hearts.

Today I rallied with @jonstewart, veterans, and their families. Thanks to their hard work, we are closer than ever to getting veterans exposed to toxic burn pits the care they deserve. Now it's time for the Senate to finish the job! https://t.co/iJyAa4m66f

Proud to join @jonstewart and our veterans at @RollToRemember today. We owe our veterans everything. And thanks to your hard work, we are about to pass the #PACTAct and ensure veterans exposed to toxic burn pits get the health care they have EARNED and DESERVE. https://t.co/OBdEL2JyUv
RT @iava: Thank you @SenGillibrand for coming out the @RollToRemember #PACTAct rally and all your support to get this legislation hopefully…

I'm live with Veterans Service Organizations and veterans and their families for the Rolling to Remember Rally to call on my colleagues to pass the #PACTAct and get veterans exposed to toxic burn pits the health care they deserve. https://t.co/fMuPjMzC0z

Buffalo and Uvalde and far too many communities across the country have suffered far too much. This is a moment of rage, fury, and tears. But you must take all of your fury and channel it into this fight. We must fight like our lives depend on it — because they do. https://t.co/hSDtfpHdqn

When America’s military service members willingly risk their lives for their country overseas, they do so with the understanding that they will be cared for when they come home. It's time to live up to that promise for veterans exposed to toxic burn pits. https://t.co/iJyAa4m66f

RT @SenLummis: I am working diligently with @sengillibrand to finalize bill text of our comprehensive digital asset legislation.

Civilians shouldn’t have access to weapons of war. Period. We need background checks, a ban on military-style assault rifles, and for Republicans in Congress to stop standing in the way of common sense gun reform. #EnoughIsEnough https://t.co/ZtCTDijqtU

My heart breaks for these families. No parent should ever have to endure the heartbreak they have. None of our kids should ever have to suffer this fear or trauma. We don't have to be a country that lets mass shootings happen at our schools over and over and over again. https://t.co/naEntkeUJn

A retired police officer shot the gunman. Buffalo police arrived in just one minute. But because of the type of weapon he had, one gunman was able to kill many people quickly.

We need to ban military-style assault rifles. https://t.co/591TFtyglm
We won't go back. We will fight like our lives depend on it, because they do. #BansOffOurBodies https://t.co/uxLzSQJFPe
Played a game of softball with my staff against the Chili Dogs, the Congressional Hispanic Staff Association's team! Great game, everyone! ⚾ https://t.co/4BFQwWbFGF
@AOC Congrats!!! Wishing you and Riley all the happiness in the world.

After fighting for years to get veterans exposed to toxic burn pits the health care they deserve, it's official: We have a bipartisan deal. Thanks to @jonstewart, @johnfeal2, @marcorubio, @jontester, @moranforkansas, and all of the veterans. Now let's get it done. https://t.co/9KXgfxM3es

Thank you @JoeBiden for following my suggestion to use the Defense Production Act to quickly get baby formula back on the shelves. Let's get parents and babies the relief they need — fast! https://t.co/IRQjwdw3NF

Congrats @JohnFetterman! He's exactly the fighter that Pennsylvania families need. And he's one of our best chances to flip a seat from red to blue and expand our Senate majority. With so much at stake, we've got to get to work now to help him win: https://t.co/CH4tpOdj8q https://t.co/KxsCQDGhhu

A security guard who was a former police officer tried to stop the gunman. The Buffalo police arrived on the scene in one minute. But one gunman was still able to murder ten people in that short amount of time.

It's long past time to ban military-style assault rifles. https://t.co/RCA8w3q3Hz

Almost one year before she was murdered, Kat Massey wrote a letter to @TheBuffaloNews calling for federal legislation to end the gun violence epidemic. For Kat — and for every victim of gun violence in Buffalo & across the country — we must get this done. https://t.co/vcHNBT1wdZ

Yesterday, ten innocent people were murdered in Buffalo, victims of a shooting fueled by hate, racism and anti-Semitism. I joined @TheRevAl to address domestic terrorism, online extremism and the ceaseless cycle of gun violence plaguing our country.

https://t.co/2Srw0YFaYl

Together, we can be a stronger people. Together, we can fight the evil, and fight the hate, and with God’s help, we will prevail. I will be in Buffalo soon to share in the grieving and healing following this senseless act of hatred and violence. (4/4)
God is looking at us today, at His people, and saying, “You can withstand these trials. You can endure. You have my love, you have my spirit, and you will be rewarded.” (3/4)

As I told the congregation, when disaster strikes our families or our loved ones, we can’t always understand God’s purpose. We can’t understand how such horrible things can happen to such good people. (2/4)
This morning, @chuckschumer and I joined True Bethel Baptist Church in Buffalo to pray in the wake of yesterday’s tragedy. (1/4) https://t.co/1KixEvTNbV

I am heartbroken for the victims of today’s shooting in Buffalo, and am praying for their loved ones and first responders.

We must do more to address the scourge of racism and anti-Semitism, and to pass commonsense gun safety measures to keep our communities safe.

Loved seeing @GaleBrewerNYC, @Rebecca76AD, @DeborahJGlick, @JulieMenin, @LindaBRosenthal,@CordellForNY, and @Carmen4NYC for drinks at Heidi’s on the UES!💪 And a special thanks to my co-host extraordinaire, @LizKrueger! https://t.co/wGwT6FPvI6

Today, I announced the FABRIC Act in NYC's Garment District: The first federal bill to secure protections for domestic garment workers and offer incentives for companies to bring manufacturing home. Grateful to the coalition of 60+ endorsers for helping bring this bill to life. https://t.co/o37HNLMhP9

Our country's infant formula shortage is a life or death issue. I'm calling on the Biden administration to use the Defense Production Act to increase the domestic production of baby formula to meet this urgent demand. https://t.co/rKWYQ7ua8A
I’ll be in Brooklyn tomorrow to rally for reproductive justice alongside @PPact, @LatinaInstitute, and @GGENYC. Join us in the fight—find an event near you: https://t.co/628pRlNKb2

If Roe is overturned, Democratic governors will be a critical line of defense in protecting our bodily autonomy. There are FIVE Democratic women governors up for re-election this year—please consider making a donation to support their campaigns:

We cannot allow 50% of Americans to be told they have to put their bodies at risk of life or death without their consent. It is barbaric. It is inhumane. It is unacceptable. 

A thread on one way we can take action to protect our reproductive freedoms today:

I’m so lucky to be spending Mother’s Day upstate with my boys. Being Theo and Henry’s mom is the greatest privilege of my life, and it is such a joy to watch them grow and explore. Happy #MothersDay! https://t.co/4K4Oyp2AGP

Make a donation to an on-the-ground organization helping people access reproductive health care in states where they’ve been stripped of their bodily autonomy. My team put together this list as a starting point—please comment w/ others as well.

When you take away a woman’s right to make her own decisions about her health and well-being, she is no longer a full citizen of this country. She no longer has freedom, she no longer has bodily autonomy, and she no longer has basic civil rights. Here’s one way we fight back:
